name: Metro TH Window
Opening check
Visual inspect opening prepration, report any damages
Check R/O Size (RL, Width,Hight, dimensions to C/L) based on QA opening handover&shop drawing(ADD survey drawings in here if not as per drawings)
Flashing Install
Select&Check flashing type agasint drawing
Visual inspect flashing if any damages
Sill flashing install as per RL&detail
Jamb flashing install plumb&align as per drawing&detail
Head flashing install as per RL&detail
All flashings fixings install as per drawing&detail
All flashings seal as per drawing&detail
Flashings trade clean
Joinery Install
Check the joinery if any damages
Frame installed in correct posistion & Level
All joinery fixings install as per drawing&detail
All fixings oversealed on frame and no tooling damage on frame
No packers visable out of line where airseal is to be installed
Joinery trade clean
Airseal seal Install
PEF Rod install correctly and sealant ratio achieved
SIKA AT Façade applied as per spec
Weather seal Install
PEF Rod install correctly and sealant ratio achieved
SIKA WS-605 S applied as per spec
Glass
Glazed refer GPL QA
Installer sign off
All elements completed correctly as per drawing
